name: Hellblaze
description:
It's a really simple game made in 3 hours. Made for #Trijam24

A few billion years later. Sun is about to engulf the earth and you're the last hope. You need to keep The Sun burning by giving it fuel. 

Controls:

WASD to move

Pickup asteroids (or alien ships) and tow them into The Sun.

Tools Used:
  • Unity 2019.3
  • Asesprite
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Visual Studio Community
